channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 11:16 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
item.description: 游댮 11:16 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游 10:00 free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291
item.description: 游 10:00 free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291#Kupyansky_ region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 09:39 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky Territorial Community- Mirovsk Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 09:39 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky Territorial Community- Mirovsk Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
